alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 1:40PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Hamilton and northern Herkimer Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 140 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Old Forge, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Old Forge around 145 PM EDT. Alger Island Public Campground around 200 PM EDT. Limekiln Lake Campground and Eagle Bay around 205 PM EDT. Inlet around 210 PM EDT. Eighth Lake Campground and Brown Tract Pond Campground around 215 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Minnehaha, Thendara, Carter Station, Mountain Lodge and First Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
